mapper.insert: insert into attribute (ATTRIBUTE_NAME) select t1.name from user t1 left join attribute t2 on t1.id = t2.id where t1.id >= ( select t3.id from user t3 left join sku s on t3.name = s.name where s.id >= (select 200 from dual)) group by t1.name ,t2.update_dt,t2.attribute_name having t1.name is not null order by t2.update_dt asc
